001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
005import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionInput;
006import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutPoint;
007import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
008
009import java.util.Objects;
010
011/**
012 * Immutable aggregate of data for TransactionInput. This holds the same data as {@link Utxo.Complete} and
013 * the two may be combined in the future.
014 */
015public class TransactionInputDataUtxo implements TransactionInputData, Utxo {
016    private final Sha256Hash txId;
017    private final int index;
018    private final long amount;
019    private final Script script;
020
021    /**
022     * @param txId parent txId (shouldn't be needed but Transaction.addSignedInput currently needs an Outpoint)
023     * @param index index of unspent output
024     * @param amount amount of unspent output
025     * @param script This is the scriptPubKey of the utxo we want to spend
026     */
027    public TransactionInputDataUtxo(Sha256Hash txId, int index, Coin amount, Script script) {
028        this.txId = Objects.requireNonNull(txId);
029        this.index = index;
030        this.amount = amount != null ? amount.getValue() : 0;        // TODO: Throw when amount is null?
031        this.script = Objects.requireNonNull(script);
032    }
033
034    public Sha256Hash txId() {
035        return txId;
036    }
037
038    public int index() {
039        return index;
040    }
041
042    @Override
043    public Coin amount() { return Coin.ofSat(amount); }
044
045    @Override
046    public Script script() {
047        return script;
048    }
049    
050    public TransactionInput toMutableInput() {
051        return createTransactionInput(toOutPoint(), Coin.ofSat(amount), script);
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    public Utxo.Complete toUtxo() {
056        return Utxo.of(txId, index, Coin.ofSat(amount), script);
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    public TransactionOutPoint toOutPoint() {
061        return new TransactionOutPoint(index, txId);
062    }
063
064    private static TransactionInput createTransactionInput(TransactionOutPoint outPoint, Coin amount, Script script) {
065        return new TransactionInput( null, script.program(), outPoint, amount);
066    }
067}
